channel.title: Hey Guys, I'm new , I need some help (quick learner)
channel.description: :o Hey, I need help making a private or public , etc. server (this is long so perpare yourself) *sigh* I've learned Everything that's basic , but im strugling with the client.java .... i think i have it it's like this whole script , but when i search _crtl+h_ for something it doesnt come up with any results . im really confused with the codes and what they mean like like,,....please reply and i'll have a 1on1 its really FRUSTURATING! :mad:

item.title: Hey Guys, I'm new , I need some help (quick learner)
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

comon guys cut him some slack

when you want to change your starting look you should look for this in player.java. Anything to do with the character itself like changin your starting look (clothes and what not). and changing what he is wearing, were the new player is spawned at is mostly in player.java.

//Giving the player an unique look
playerEquipment[playerHat]=1155;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=1117;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=1189;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1075;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=3060;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3061;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1321;

this is pretty much self explanitory. look up the item code you want evrything in this is bronze, but look up like rune plate or something and were is says playerchest you put the item code in there. ill be posting some more gimmi a sec.

ok making npcs say wether your on or not depends on your source for my knowlede. but you should learn how to spawn an npc pretty much. You should learn what cfg is and how to edit that. because im sayin this is depending on your source is that i never really added that, but i know how to edit what the npc is sayin. It is reallly basic once you learn it. if you ever need help just ask me. Ill come back with an answer if i know what your asking me

Read full topic
item.source: Hey Guys, I'm new , I need some help (quick learner)
